UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Peptides Display Strong Synergy with Vancomycin Against Vancomycin-Resistant E. faecium, S. aureus, and Wild-Type E. coli
Literature.Author: Wu C-L, Hsueh J-Y, Yip B-S, Chih Y-H, Peng K-L, Cheng J-W

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecium BCRC 15B0132(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus VISA1(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus VISA3(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus VRSA1(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus VRSA2(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µg/ml)
